mapper.insert: insert into member (M_RANK, M_ID, M_PW, M_NAME, M_ZIPCODE, M_ADDRESS1, M_ADDRESS2, M_EMAIL_ID, M_EMAIL_DOMAIN, M_CELLPHONE1, M_CELLPHONE2, M_CELLPHONE3, M_POINT, M_DATE, M_NICKNAME) values ('customer', #{M_ID}, #{M_PW}, #{M_NAME}, #{M_ZIPCODE}, #{M_ADDRESS1}, #{M_ADDRESS2}, #{M_EMAIL_ID}, #{M_EMAIL_DOMAIN}, #{M_CELLPHONE1}, #{M_CELLPHONE2}, #{M_CELLPHONE3},0,sysdate,#{M_NICKNAME})
mapper.select: Select COUNT(M_ID) AS RESULT FROM member where M_ID = #{M_ID}
Select COUNT(M_NICKNAME) AS RESULT FROM member where M_NICKNAME = #{M_NICKNAME}
